## Protein Project

Generating a Heatmap using MUSCLE alignments




```{r}
library(bio3d)
```

```{r}
aln <- read.fasta("aln-fasta.txt")

aln
```


```{r}
par(mai = c(8,8,8,8))
```



```{r}
aln2 <- seqidentity(aln)

aln2

heatmap(aln2, margins = c(10,5))
```
